Articles.Content:
Windows 11, Ryzen 9 5900HX, 16GB, RTX3070, KSP2 v0.1.0.0.20892

If  you try to board a capsule that doesn't have a spare seat it doesn't notify you, it just has the Kerbal let go and float away.

Also sometimes even if there's a spare seat pressing B to board does nothing and requires a quit and restart.
